column4: I'm already blind. well not totally :p but I've glasses mostly because of monitors I guess
I should use my laptop more often, and never in a dark room
I still need my pc for gaming.. and its faster for the rest too
a p4 ht 3.2 ghz with 1gig isnt faster than a centrino 1.7 with 512  (though its already fast) ?
I don't use windows for ages
you think gaming=windows like a lot of people. I really don't
is it true that centrino is faster than p4 3.2ghz?
wasnt it the other way around?
I said the p4 is faster than the centrino, but that the centrino is already quite fast
i thought centrino is faster, i read it in intel website, but i forgot the link
maybe the p4 is faster because it uses 1gb ram?
sorry, i forgot which centrino and which p4
the centrino is faster than a p4 as the same frequence. but here its 1.7 vs 3.2
